name: ANNA alpha v1
description:
(I recommend playing this in fullscreen)

Anna is a game about moving on. Forty Four screens of searing, nonstop pain! Try it on a Game Boy Color or your favorite emulator.

Controls:

Move: WASD

A: J

B: K

Start: Enter

Select: Shift

Right now this game is in very early development. I hope these screens help illustrate what I'm going for.
